frontmatter.title: Contiguous Range Sets
frontmatter.subtitle: Where we discover how a strange data structure, featuring time & space complexity relative to the number of holes in a number series, can help us resuming multithreaded execution

frontmatter.title: Implementing an efficient LRU cache in JavaScript
frontmatter.subtitle: Where we discover how to harness the power of JavaScript's typed arrays to design our very own low-cost pointer system for fixed-capacity data structures

frontmatter.title: Dupond & Dupont: La déduplication assistée par ordinateur
frontmatter.description: A guided tour of deduplication algorithms and their usage in a variety of social sciences projects.
